definitions.definition: the organ inside the head that controls thought, memory, feelings, and activity:
examples: Doctors tried desperately to reduce the swelling in her brain.
Marie has an amazing brain (= is very intelligent).

definitions.definition: a very intelligent person, especially one who has spent a lot of time studying:
examples: We have the best brains in the land working on this problem.

definitions.definition: the most intelligent person in a group, especially the person who plans what the group will do:
examples: My little brother's the brains of the family.

definitions.definition: to hit someone on the head:
examples: I'll brain you if you don't keep quiet.
